import{assets}from"./data";var depositsInterest=function depositsInterest(){return assets.deposits.map(function(item){var timestamp=new Date().getTime();var time=new Date(item.start).getTime();var secondsAccumalated=(timestamp-time)/1000;var interestInSecond=item.interest/31557600;//Stands from 365.25 / 24 / 60 / 60;
return interestInSecond*secondsAccumalated*item.amount/100;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item;},0);};export default depositsInterest;
